TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi GridSplitter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb

summary.span: 表示控制項，可重新分配 控制項中各資料行或資料列之間的間距。

span.span: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控制項的資料列或資料行之間間距，而不需要變更的維度。The control redistributes space between rows or columns in a , without changing the dimensions of the . 例如，當調整大小的兩個資料行，的一個資料行的屬性會在同一時間而增加相同的數量會減少的其他資料行屬性。For example, when a resizes two columns, the property of one column is increased while at the same time the property of the other column is decreased by the same amount. 下表顯示如何定義水平或垂直藉由設定並屬性，藉由保留和屬性設為其預設值。The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical by setting the and properties and by leaving the and properties set to their default values. **如何建立垂直和水平的 GridSplitter 控制項****How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter 類型GridSplitter type| 值 value| 值 value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |調整資料列Resizes rows||, , , , | |調整大小資料行Resizes columns|, , , , || |如果大於或等於，這會調整大小的資料行。If is greater than or equal to , this resizes the columns.

如果是小於，這會調整大小的資料列。If is less than , this resizes the rows.||| A可以重疊的資料列或資料行包含其他內容，或可能會佔用的資料列或資料行本身。A can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself. 如需有關如何定義，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 GridSplitter 調整大小的資料列](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md)並[如何： 使用 GridSplitter 調整大小的資料行](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)。For more information about how to define a , see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md). 如果並屬性設定並不會達到所需行為，您可以變更和屬性設定。If the and property settings do not achieve the desired behavior, you can change the and property settings. A可能會包含在其他物件被遮蔽的集合。A may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the collection of the . 如需如何避免這種情況的資訊，請參閱[如何： 確保 GridSplitter 是可見](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md)。For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義，調整大小的資料行藉由覆疊的資料行的邊緣。The following example shows how to define a that resizes columns in a by overlaying the edge of a column. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridsplittersimpleexample)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridsplittersimpleexample)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridsplittersimpleexample)] 下列範例示範如何定義，調整大小的資料行而且，佔滿中的資料行。The following example shows how to define a that resizes columns in a and that occupies a column in the . [!code-xaml[GridSplitterRowColumn#GridSplitterEntireColumnPart1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterRowColumn/CS/Window1.xaml#gridsplitterentirecolumnpart1)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterRowColumn#GridSplitterEntireColumnPart2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterRowColumn/CS/Window1.xaml#gridsplitterentirecolumnpart2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DragIncrement { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.DragIncrement : double with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定使用者必須拖曳滑鼠的最短距離，以便使用 控制項調整資料列或資料行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a control.

value.span: 值，表示使用者必須使用滑鼠拖曳 的最短距離，以調整資料列或資料行的大小。

span.span: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a to resize rows or columns.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所定義的最小距離重新初始化持續隨著使用者拖曳滑鼠。The minimum distance that is defined by is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse. 例如，當您拖曳由數量、 資料列或資料行調整大小。For example, when you drag the by the amount, the rows or columns are resized. 若要調整多個資料列和資料行，您必須將拖曳相同的數量。To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the the same amount. 因此，變更會藉由使用滑鼠或鍵盤來移動的資料行和資料列的大小都會以 64kb 的倍數。Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the are made in multiples of the . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dragincrement)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dragincrement)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#dragincrement)]

member this.PreviewStyle : System.Windows.Style with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定樣式，針對 屬性設定為 時所顯示的 控制項預覽指示區，這個樣式會自訂外觀、效果或其他樣式特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the control preview indicator that is displayed when the property is set to .

value.span: 傳回預覽指示區的 ，當您移動 控制項時，預覽指示區會顯示 維度中的可能變更。

span.span: Returns the for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in dimensions as you move the control.

value.span: 預設為目前主題所提供的樣式。

span.span: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定樣式時，但有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [設定樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 下列其中之一：`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). `StyleResourceKey` 識別所要求的樣式索引鍵。The key that identifies the style being requested. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 請參閱[內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 使用繫結參考或也是可行的但不常見。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| 預覽變更資料列或資料行的界限會顯示在使用者拖曳控制項，而屬性設定為`true`。A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`. 當使用者放開滑鼠按鈕時，會設定資料行和資料列的界限。The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.

summary.span: 取得或設定相對於 控制項定義的資料行或資料列而調整大小的資料行或資料列。

span.span: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the control is defined.

value.span: 其中一個列舉值，指出這個 控制項會重新調整哪些資料行或資料列的大小。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定，調整資料列或欄大小，請將和屬性。To specify a that resizes rows or columns, set the and properties. 如果您無法藉由設定來達到所要的行為並屬性，變更或預設值。If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the and properties, change the or default values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 GridSplitter 調整大小的資料列](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md)並[如何： 使用 GridSplitter 調整大小的資料行](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)。For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#ResizeBehavior](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#resizebehavior)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#ResizeBehavior](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#resizebehavior)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#ResizeBehavior](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#resizebehavior)]

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定，調整資料列或欄大小，請將和屬性。To specify a that resizes rows or columns, set the and properties. 如果您無法藉由設定來達到所要的行為並屬性，變更或預設值。If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the and properties, change the or default values. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 使用 GridSplitter 調整大小的資料列](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md)並[如何： 使用 GridSplitter 調整大小的資料行](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md)。For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsPreview { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowsPreview : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 控制項是否會隨著使用者拖曳控制項，更新資料行或資料列的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.

value.span: 如果顯示 預覽，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a preview is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A需要要出現在其父樹狀結構以顯示拖曳 preview 意見反應的物件。A requires an object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback. 通常滿足此需求物件所提供之預設樣式或是在所建立的物件物件。This requirement is typically met by the object that is available in the default style for the or in the object that is created by a object. 不過，如果都不是這些有的話控制項必須定義它自己物件。However, if neither of these is available, the control must define its own object. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| 當屬性設定為`true`，會顯示預覽中的資料列或資料行大小的變更。When the property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown. 實際大小變更時發行。The actual size changes when the is released. 如果屬性設定為`false`，資料行或資料列大小會即時更新使用者拖曳控制項。If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the control. 如果使用鍵盤來移動控制項、 資料行或資料列的大小會更新在即時即使屬性設定為`true`。If the keyboard is used to move the control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何設定 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showspreview)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showspreview)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#showspreview)]

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
